Posts.EditableText:
how can i find out my ip address?This is probably really easy but i just don't know.
i need it for my quest server,so people can get to the game remotely.
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText:
Go to Ask Jeeves and type in "What's my IP?" 

Simple as that.
Posts.HTML:
Go to Ask Jeeves and type in "What's my IP?"

Simple as that.

Posts.EditableText: http://www.whatismyip.com lol There is no special server or code that tells you your IP, just a tiny bit of SHTML on a web page.
Posts.HTML:
http://www.whatismyip.com

lol

There is no special server or code that tells you your IP, just a tiny bit of SHTML on a web page.

Posts.EditableText: just using that ive found out my ip is different rom yesterday.how am i going to host games if my ip changes everyday?!
Posts.HTML: just using that ive found out my ip is different rom yesterday.how am i going to host games if my ip changes everyday?!

Posts.EditableText: If you're using windows you can type "ipconfig" in the command prompt.
Posts.HTML: If you're using windows you can type "ipconfig" in the command prompt.

Posts.EditableText: there might be a free service that allows you to register a static IP"one that never changes", do a search for such a service
Posts.HTML: there might be a free service that allows you to register a static IP"one that never changes", do a search for such a service

Posts.EditableText:
[quote="francisstokes":i7pte2j6]just using that ive found out my ip is different rom yesterday.how am i going to host games if my ip changes everyday?![/quote:i7pte2j6]

What does hosting games have to do with your IP changing? You can still set up a website whether your IP changes or not.
Posts.HTML:
francisstokes wrote:just using that ive found out my ip is different rom yesterday.how am i going to host games if my ip changes everyday?!


What does hosting games have to do with your IP changing? You can still set up a website whether your IP changes or not.

Posts.EditableText: Yes but you cant host Quest Online Games to well if your IP Addy changes everytime you log onto the Internet.
Posts.HTML: Yes but you cant host Quest Online Games to well if your IP Addy changes everytime you log onto the Internet.

Posts.EditableText:
Quote from the help file:

[quote:yaiqwzyk]
Here are a few websites where you can sign up for a static DNS name:

DynDns.org 
DNS2Go 
HN.org 
DHS 
No-IP.com 
CJB.net 
[/quote:yaiqwzyk]
